Class BehaviorInstruction

Indicates how a custom attribute or element should be instantiated in a view.

Static normal

normal: BehaviorInstruction

A default behavior used in scenarios where explicit configuration isn't available.

  • dynamic(host: Element, viewModel: Object, viewFactory: ViewFactory): BehaviorInstruction
    • Defined in node_modules/aurelia-templating/dist/aurelia-templating.d.ts:628

    Creates a dynamic component instruction.

    Parameters

    • host: Element

      The element that will parent the dynamic component.

    • viewModel: Object

      The dynamic component's view model instance.

    • viewFactory: ViewFactory

      A view factory used in generating the component's view.

    Returns BehaviorInstruction

    The created instruction.
